The Halo automatic tire inflation system for semi-truck tractors and trailers installs in minutes to increase fuel efficiency and tire life.

Industry

Transportation

Vintage

IIF 1

[/dica_divi_carouselitem][dica_divi_carouselitem title=”EcoWorks” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”on” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” url=”https://blackhornvc.com/project/ecoworks/” url_new_window=”on” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Ecoworks modernizes settlement buildings from the 1950s to 1970s according to the Net Zero principle and supplies the buildings and their tenants with CO2-free heat for at least 15 years and offers tenant electricity. The keyword is serial renovation.

Investment Announcement →

Industry

[/dica_divi_carouselitem][dica_divi_carouselitem title=”Electric Era” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”on” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” url=”https://blackhornvc.com/project/electric-era/” url_new_window=”on” sticky_enabled=”0″]
